name: Spicy Bacon Deviled Eggs
author: Terry E.
summary: These deviled eggs include bacon and shredded Cheddar cheese. And a wasabi kick.
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel
Remove yolks to a small bowl and mash; reserve hollow egg whites
Fry bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain the bacon slices on paper towels and crumble
Reserve a small amount of bacon and Cheddar cheese in separate bowls; stir remainder into mashed egg yolks with mayonnaise
Fill egg whites with a heaping spoonful of the yolk mixture
Sprinkle with reserved bacon and Cheddar cheese before serving
